sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Button, Text, Grommet, Paragraph, Main, Heading, Card, CardHeader,CardFooter,CardBody, Avatar} from 'grommet';
import { Hpe, Menu, Home, HelpOption } from 'grommet-icons';
import Foooter from './component/Foooter';

function App() {

  const theme = {
    global: {
      colors: {
        brand: '#01A982',
      },
      font: {
        family: 'Roboto',
        size: '18px',
        height: '20px',
      },
    },
  };

  const AppBar = (props) => (
      <Box
        tag='header'
        direction='row'
        align='center'
        justify='between'
        pad={{ left: 'small', right: 'small', vertical: 'small' }}
        elevation='medium'
        style={{ zIndex: '1' }}
        {...props}
      />
    );

  return (
    <Grommet theme={theme}>

      <Main pad="large">
        <Box>
          <Heading gap="small">Hello, Jane!</Heading>
          <Text>Welcome to the HPE Common Cloud Console.</Text>
        </Box>

        <Box direction="row" gap="large" pad="medium">
          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">Take a Tour</CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Body</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>

          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">Header</CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Body</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>

          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">Header</CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Body</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>

          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">Header</CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Body</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>
        </Box>

        <Box direction="row" gap="large">
        <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">Header</CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Body</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>

          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">Header</CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Body</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>

          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">Header</CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Body</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>

          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">Header</CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Body</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>
        </Box>

        <Box direction="row" gap="large" pad="medium">
          <Card  height="small" width="medium" background="light-1">
                <CardHeader pad="medium">Header</CardHeader>
                <CardBody pad="medium">Body</CardBody>
                <CardFooter pad="medium"> Footer </CardFooter>
          </Card>
          
        </Box>
        
      </Main>

      <Foooter />
    </Grommet>
  );
}

export default App;
